actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to conduct a study on methods to dramatically increase the percentage of consumers effectively reached by product safety recalls.
short_title: Consumer Product Safety Recall Improvement Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Consumer Product Safety Recall Improvement Act - Instructs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to study and report to Congress on methods to dramatically increase the number of consumers effectively reached by product safety recalls, including by creation of an improved consumer recall notification system.

titles.title: Consumer Product Safety Recall Improvement Act
To require the Consumer Product Safety Commission to conduct a study on methods to dramatically increase the percentage of consumers effectively reached by product safety recalls.
